# Interactive Map Demo

The map below demonstrates how an externally hosted, interactive web map
can be embedded directly into a Quarto website using a simple HTML
iframe. This example shows a neighborhood-scale dataset displayed
through a Leaflet map exported from QGIS using the qgis2web plugin.

```{=html}
<iframe
  src="https://geospatialresearchlab.github.io/demo_qgis2web_map/#11/38.8939/-77.0145"
  width="100%"
  height="600"
  style="border:none;"
  loading="lazy">
</iframe>
```
